meanings.definition: The quality or fact of being done or occurring at a favorable or useful time; promptness.
meanings.sent1: Her timelinesses in submitting the report impressed the boss.
meanings.sent2: Paying bills on time is a good example of timelinesses.
meanings.sent3: The cat's timelinesses in catching the mouse saved the day.
meanings.sent4: The timelinesses of the rescue team prevented a disaster.
meanings.sent5: The timelinesses of the morning sunrise brought hope to the town.

meanings.definition: The quality of being timely; timelyness.
meanings.sent1: The timelinesses of his jokes always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The timelinesses of the train schedule helped commuters plan their day.
meanings.sent3: The clown's timelinesses in arriving late to the party caused confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her words had the timelinesses of a well-tuned orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The timelinesses of the flowers blooming signaled the start of spring.
